Articles.Content: So a few days ago i updated,and it kept getting frozen then later on,i said that there were no new updates.Now i cannt even get past the loading screen.Please help!

> 
> So a few days ago i updated,and it kept getting frozen then later on,i said that there were no new updates.Now i cannt even get past the loading screen.Please help!

Try uninstalling the mods

If that doesn't work just backup your saves and do a complete reinstall
